category.definition: Contains concepts relating to visual elements.

concept.definition: Used to specifically indicate the glyph-based aspect of another concept. For example, the Symbol to TrebleClef is GClef.

An integer indicating the number of lines and/or spaces away from the middle line or space of a staff. An increment of one indicates the distance from a space to a neighboring line or a line to a neighboring space.
Represents the general notion of up.
Represents the general notion of down.
Represents the ratio at which a beam is divided, such as 1/8, 1/16, etc.

Attribute of a token, in which an alternate visual design is desired. Many musical symbols have common alternate designs that are semantically identical, but visually distinct enough to be selected separately.
